snippet: Visitors to the center in the department store will be able to get directions, make dinner reservations and buy tickets to other attractions.
abstract: George A Fertitta, chief executive of NYC & Company, city’s marketing agency, along with Macy's chief executive Terry J Lundgren will officially open a visitor center on store's mezzanine level; say collaboration is a first between a retailer and a city tourism agency.
lead_paragraph: Visitors to the center in the department store will be able to get directions, make dinner reservations and buy tickets to other attractions.

headline.main: Tourist-Hungry New York to Put Visitor Center in Macy’s
headline.print_headline:
City Is Putting
Visitor Center
For Tourists
Inside Macy’s
